abstract: HSBC Holdings, Europe’s biggest bank, will focus its Asia acquisitions strategy on China and other expanding markets, Sandy Flockhart, chief executive of Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corp, said Monday.
snippet: HSBC Holdings, Europe’s biggest bank, will focus its Asia acquisitions strategy on China and other expanding markets, Sandy Flockhart, chief executive of Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corp, said Monday.
lead_paragraph: HSBC Holdings, Europe’s biggest bank, will focus its Asia acquisitions strategy on China and other expanding markets, Sandy Flockhart, chief executive of its Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation unit said Monday.

headline.main: HSBC Eyes Mergers in China, Bank Chief Says
